title: Every person who intends to erects a building shall not at any time erect or cause or permit to erect or re-erect any building which in any way encroaches upon or diminishes the area set apart as means of access
clause_text: Every person who intends to erects a building shall not at any time erect or cause or permit to erect or re-erect any building which in any way encroaches upon or diminishes the area set apart as means of access. Building Layout or Sub-division proposal shall be submitted for the following :-
section: Authorities to Supply Complete Information about Restrictions to the Authority

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
